Package ch.pschatzmann.stocks.strategy.optimization

Optimizations of Parameter Values
Author:
pschatzmann
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IFitness  
    IOptimizableTradingStrategy  
    IOptimizer  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BinarySearchOptimizer
    We optimize a single parameter using a binary search.
    BruteForceOptimizer
    We try all combinations of all parameter values in order to find the optimum.
    Fitness
    The Fitness class is using the trader to execute a trading strategy and calculate the KPIs.
    GeneticOptimizer
    Optimizer which uses a genetic algorithm to optimize the parameters.
    PermutatedBinarySearchOptimizer
    We optimize a single parameter using a binary search.
    SequenceOptimizer
    We try all combinations of all parameter values in order to find the optimum.
    SimulatedAnnealingOptimizer
    Optimizer using SimulatedAnnealing https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simulated_annealing
    SimulatedFitness
    The Fitness class is using the paper trader to evaluate a trading strategy and calculate the KPIs.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    InputParameterName
